name: Dinner Tonight: Long Beans and Tofu Stir Fry
description: Me and tofu don't have much of a history, but I'm happy that this recipe brought us a little closer. The extra-firm tofu sucks up the spicy sauce, and transforms into impressively flavorful little bites that are far from the...
recipeIngredient: 3/4 pound Chinese long beans, ends removed and chopped into 2 inch segments
1/2 red bell pepper, stem removed and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the vegetable broth, fish sauce, chili garlic sauce, and sugar in a large bowl. Set aside.

Place an large skillet over high heat. When hot, add the oil and the onion. Cook, stirring constantly, for about 30 seconds. Then dump in the long beans and cook, continuing to stir, for about 2 1/2 minutes.
Pour in the sauce, the red pepper, and the tofu. Stir occasionally, and cook for 3 minutes, or until the long beans are tender.
